Package com.j2igf.framework.event

Class Debug

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.event.Debug
public final class Debug extends Object
This class provides a simple logging system for the framework.
Author:
Aryan Rai

    This is the inner class that defined the log formatter.

    • setRenderer

      public static void setRenderer (Renderer renderer)
      This function sets the renderer for debug info.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer using which the debug info will be rendered.

      This function enables the logging system.

    • renderMessage

      public static void renderMessage (String message)
      This function renders debug information to the screen.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be rendered. If this parameter is null, nothing will be rendered.
